product_description: Breads: Focaccia product	8518	Clear Bag		Loaf	1	56 oz.
reason_for_recall: Products held under insanitary conditions
code_info: All product delivered between December 12 and December 16. This would include bread items with an expiration date of 12/25/22 and earlier, and any bun items with an expiration date of 12/21/22 and earlier

recalling_firm: FRESH IDEATION FOOD GROUP, LLC dba Fresh Creative Cuisine
distribution_pattern: The recalled product was distributed to the following states: MD, PA, DE, NY, DC, NJ, NC, CT, SC, VA, MA .
product_description: Quick & Fresh, Banana Chocolate Chip Muffin, Net . Wt. 3 Oz. Single Serving, Keep refrigerated
reason_for_recall: On 02/03/2023, FRESH IDEATION FOOD GROUP, LLC dba Fresh Creative Cuisine of Baltimore, MD is  initiating a recall of  various products sold from January 24, 2023 through January 30, 2023 because the products have the potential to be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes .

recalling_firm: PILGRIMS ROASTED NUTZ
initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit
distribution_pattern: Distributed in California, Oregon, and Washington.
product_description: Pilgrim's Roasted Nut'Z Creme Brulee Cashews are packaged by hand into either the 8 oz Plastic Cone Bags or 8 Oz Pouch Bags. Label declares Cashews, Sugar, French Vanilla Syrup, Caramel Syrup.
reason_for_recall: Creme Brulee Cashews product is recalled due to undeclared walnut.
